sentences: Jilian Medford, better known by her stage name Ian Sweet, is an American indie rock musician from Los Angeles, California.
The album was listed at number 33 on Stereogum's list of the "50 Best Albums of 2016".
Ian Sweet was also listed as one of Stereogum's best new bands of 2016.
In 2018, Medford followed up her debut with her second full-length album titled Crush Crusher, also on Hardly Art.
Medford's third full-length album, Show Me How You Disappear, was released on March 5, 2021.
